sentences.chinese: 小心圖表建造者創造的幻覺。

sentences.english: This constant choiceless awareness ends all illusions and all hypocrisy.
sentences.chinese: 這種不停的無選擇的覺察終結了所有幻覺和所有虛僞。

sentences.english: That's when Moore makes in a hallucinatory state. (She eats his tuber.
sentences.chinese: 那是摩爾讓沼澤異形和艾比奧肯在幻覺狀態下野合。

sentences.english: And that is how illusion and delusion vanishes .
sentences.chinese: 唯有放下，所有幻覺與假相才得以消失。

sentences.english: The phantom of the slain Caesar appeared to Brutus in a dream.
sentences.chinese: 布魯圖斯夢中幻覺殺死凱撒。

sentences.english: River side negotiation Chiang-Nan of winter all give folk a kind of Cuo to cannot liken with to protect of illusion.
sentences.chinese: 江邊談判江南的冬天總是給人一種措不及防的幻覺。

sentences.english: His mind could no longer distinguish between illusion and reality.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭腦已不再能分清幻覺和現實。

sentences.english: Beyond the illusionary screen, summer heat is billowing.
sentences.chinese: 幻覺的屏風之外，夏天，熱浪滾滾。

sentences.english: The past, present and future, are only illusions , however persistent.
sentences.chinese: 過去，現在，未來，無論怎樣貫徹始終，都是幻覺。

sentences.english: What medicine ate can illusory or phonism?
sentences.chinese: 什麼藥吃了會產生幻覺或幻聽？

sentences.english: Is it just an idealistic, delusional view of the future?
sentences.chinese: 還是說這只是一個對未來的理想主義的幻覺？

sentences.english: Aguirre is now the ruler of a group of slowly starving, hallucinating men.
sentences.chinese: 阿基爾現在成了一羣飽受飢餓與幻覺困擾者的首領。

sentences.english: Aside from hallucinogenic properties, mushrooms can also kill.
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇除了能引起幻覺的性能外，也能致命。

sentences.english: Sometimes burnout can be an illusion.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，怠惰可能是一個幻覺。

sentences.english: Two years after his last dose of LSD he was still deliring.
sentences.chinese: 停服麻醉藥雖已過了兩年，但他仍被幻覺困擾着。

definition: to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
